mapper.sql: APCODE, CURCDE, CUSIDT, LEGPNY, NLEGPG, ORGIDT, PAGLIN, SYSIDT, FSTPAG, DAYEND, LEGDEP, LEGDAT, LEGTIM, ORGID3, TLRNUM, VCHSET, SETSEQ, SECCCY, DRACCM, CRACCM, TXNAMT, ACTBAL, LASBAL, VALDAT, RVSLBL, ORGID2, PRDCDE, CRNYER, PRDSEQ, FILLER, THRREF, FURINF, FXRATE, SECPMT, SECBAL, SECLBA, RECSTS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ACTLGC
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ACTLGC (APCODE, CURCDE, CUSIDT, LEGPNY, NLEGPG, ORGIDT, PAGLIN, SYSIDT, FSTPAG, DAYEND, LEGDEP, LEGDAT, LEGTIM, ORGID3, TLRNUM, VCHSET, SETSEQ, SECCCY, DRACCM, CRACCM, TXNAMT, ACTBAL, LASBAL, VALDAT, RVSLBL, ORGID2, PRDCDE, CRNYER, PRDSEQ, FILLER, THRREF, FURINF, FXRATE, SECPMT, SECBAL, SECLBA, RECSTS) values (#{apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legpny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nlegpg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paglin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstpag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legdep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{legtim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tlrnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vchset,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{setseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{secccy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{txnamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lasbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{valdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rvslbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prdcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crnyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prdseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thrref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{furinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{secpmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{secbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{seclba,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ACTLGC
APCODE = #{record.apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURCDE = #{record.curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSIDT = #{record.cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGPNY = #{record.legpny,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NLEGPG = #{record.nlegpg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORGIDT = #{record.orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGLIN = #{record.paglin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYSIDT = #{record.sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSTPAG = #{record.fstpag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAYEND = #{record.dayend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGDEP = #{record.legdep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGDAT = #{record.legdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEGTIM = #{record.legtim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID3 = #{record.orgid3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TLRNUM = #{record.tlrnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VCHSET = #{record.vchset,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETSEQ = #{record.setseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECCCY = #{record.secccy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ACTLGC set APCODE = #{record.apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURCDE = #{record.curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSIDT = #{record.cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGPNY = #{record.legpny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NLEGPG = #{record.nlegpg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGIDT = #{record.orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGLIN = #{record.paglin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYSIDT = #{record.sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSTPAG = #{record.fstpag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYEND = #{record.dayend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGDEP = #{record.legdep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGDAT = #{record.legdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEGTIM = #{record.legtim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID3 = #{record.orgid3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLRNUM = #{record.tlrnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VCHSET = #{record.vchset,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETSEQ = #{record.setseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECCCY = #{record.secccy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRACCM = #{record.draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRACCM = #{record.craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TXNAMT = #{record.txnamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTBAL = #{record.actbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASBAL = #{record.lasbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VALDAT = #{record.valdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RVSLBL = #{record.rvslbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID2 = #{record.orgid2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRDCDE = #{record.prdcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRNYER = #{record.crnyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRDSEQ = #{record.prdseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILLER = #{record.filler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THRREF = #{record.thrref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FURINF = #{record.furinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FXRATE = #{record.fxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECPMT = #{record.secpmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECBAL = #{record.secbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECLBA = #{record.seclba,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECSTS = #{record.recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ACTLGC
FSTPAG = #{fstpag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAYEND = #{dayend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGDEP = #{legdep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGDAT = #{legdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEGTIM = #{legtim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID3 = #{orgid3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TLRNUM = #{tlrnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VCHSET = #{vchset,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETSEQ = #{setseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECCCY = #{secccy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRACCM = #{draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRACCM = #{craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TXNAMT = #{txnamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTBAL = #{actbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASBAL = #{lasbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VALDAT = #{valdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RVSLBL = #{rvslbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID2 = #{orgid2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRDCDE = #{prdcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRNYER = #{crnyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRDSEQ = #{prdseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILLER = #{filler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THRREF = #{thrref,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FURINF = #{furinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FXRATE = #{fxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECPMT = #{secpmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECBAL = #{secbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECLBA = #{seclba,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECSTS = #{recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where APCODE = #{apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CURCDE = #{curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CUSIDT = #{cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LEGPNY = #{legpny,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and NLEGPG = #{nlegpg,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ORGIDT = #{orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PAGLIN = #{paglin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and SYSIDT = #{sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ACTLGC set FSTPAG = #{fstpag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYEND = #{dayend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGDEP = #{legdep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGDAT = #{legdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEGTIM = #{legtim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID3 = #{orgid3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLRNUM = #{tlrnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VCHSET = #{vchset,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETSEQ = #{setseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECCCY = #{secccy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRACCM = #{draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRACCM = #{craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TXNAMT = #{txnamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTBAL = #{actbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASBAL = #{lasbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VALDAT = #{valdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RVSLBL = #{rvslbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID2 = #{orgid2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRDCDE = #{prdcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRNYER = #{crnyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRDSEQ = #{prdseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILLER = #{filler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THRREF = #{thrref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FURINF = #{furinf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FXRATE = #{fxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECPMT = #{secpmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECBAL = #{secbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECLBA = #{seclba,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECSTS = #{recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where APCODE = #{apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CURCDE = #{curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CUSIDT = #{cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LEGPNY = #{legpny,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and NLEGPG = #{nlegpg,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ORGIDT = #{orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PAGLIN = #{paglin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and SYSIDT = #{sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT (select irt.irtval from actirt irt where (irt.irtkd1||irt.irtkd2)=act.cinrat and irt.curcde=act.curcde and irt.curflg='1' ) as irtval ,stm.sysidt ,stm.cusidt ,stm.orgidt ,org.orgnam ,stm.apcode ,glc.glcnam ,ani.oldacn ,act.actnam ,act.depnum ,dep.depnam ,stm.curcde ,ccy.curnmc ,lbl.legbal from actlgc stm join actorg org on stm.orgidt = org.orgidt join actapc apc on stm.apcode=apc.apcode join actglc glc on apc.glcode=glc.glcode join actani ani on stm.sysidt=ani.sysidt and stm.orgidt=ani.orgidt and stm.cusidt=ani.cusidt and stm.apcode=ani.apcode and stm.curcde=ani.curcde join actact act on stm.sysidt=act.sysidt and stm.orgidt=act.orgidt and stm.cusidt=act.cusidt and stm.apcode=act.apcode and stm.curcde=act.curcde join actdep dep on act.orgidt=dep.orgidt and act.depnum=dep.depcde join actccy ccy on stm.curcde=ccy.curcde join actlbl lbl on stm.sysidt=lbl.sysidt and stm.orgidt=lbl.orgidt and stm.cusidt=lbl.cusidt and stm.apcode=lbl.apcode and stm.curcde=lbl.curcde and stm.secccy=lbl.secccy where stm.orgidt=#{orgidt} order by oldacn

SELECT (TLRNUM||VCHSET||SETSEQ) AS CPCODE ,(CASE WHEN TXNAMT<0 THEN TXNAMT ELSE 0 END) AS DTXNAMT ,(CASE WHEN TXNAMT>=0 THEN TXNAMT ELSE 0 END) AS CTXNAMT ,ACTBAL ,LASBAL ,VALDAT ,VALDAT ,FURINF ,THRREF ,(VALDAT-(SELECT SCT.IPYDAT FROM ACTSCT SCT WHERE SCT.SCTNUM=8)) AS DAYNUM ,CRACCM ,LEGPNY,NLEGPG,PAGLIN FROM ACTLGC STM WHERE STM.SYSIDT=#{sysidt} AND STM.ORGIDT=#{orgidt} AND STM.CUSIDT=#{cusidt} AND STM.APCODE=#{apcode} AND STM.CURCDE=#{curcde} ORDER BY LEGPNY,NLEGPG,PAGLIN
